text: Timothy M. Keller (born November 22, 1977) is an American businessman and politician. He is the 30th mayor of Albuquerque, New Mexico since 2017. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was New Mexico State auditor before resigning to become mayor on December 1, 2017. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Albuquerque, New Mexico
title: Tim Keller (politician)
